|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 2402 |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 876 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://store.ui.com/us/en/pro/category/all-wifi/products/u6-plus Series] ==See also== :;[[Ubiquiti Networks#FCC ID]] *SWX-U7PRO (2024-01-04) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 7 Professional (U7-Pro) • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/21220/ubiquiti-networks-introduces-u7-pro-first-unifi-wifi-7-access-point-scores-on-affordability Review] *SWX-U6PLR (2022-12-16) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Plus Long-Range (U6-Plus-LR) * *SWX-U6P (2022-12-06) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Plus (U6-Plus) * *SWX-U6EPIW (2022-08-24) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Enterprise In-Wall (U6-EP-IW) * *SWX-U6EP (2021-08-05) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Enterprise (U6-EP) *SWX-U6MESHR (2021-06-18) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Mesh (U6-Mesh-R) *SWX-U6PROR (2021-05-11) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Professional (U6-Pro-R) * *SWX-U6LRR (2021-03-26) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Long-Range (U6-LR-R) *SWX-U6PRO (2020-11-11) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Professional (U6-Pro) • [https://www.mbreviews.com/ubiquiti-u6-pro-wifi-6-access-point-review/ Review] *SWX-U6LITE (2020-08-21) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Lite (U6-Lite) *SWX-U6EXT (2020-07-30) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Ext (U6-Ext) *SWX-U6MESH (2020-06-23) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Mesh (U6-Mesh) *SWX-U6LR (2020-05-20) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 Long-Range (U6-LR) *SWX-U6IW (2020-05-18) • Ubiquiti UniFi AP 6 In-Wall (U6-IW) ===Models=== :;[https://mightygadget.com/ubiquiti-unifi-u6-enterprise-vs-u6-pro-vs-u6-lr-vs-u6-lite/ Comparison models] • [https://ubntwiki.com/products/wireless_ap_comparison Comparison (ubntwiki)] '''
Ubiquiti AP	UniFi U6 Enterprise	UniFi U6 Pro		UniFi 6 Lite	UniFi 6 Long-Range
Processor	Qualcomm Dual-Core	Qualcomm Dual-Core	MediaTek 880MHz	MediaTek Dual-Core ARM
CPU		ARM (Cortex-A53)	ARM (Cortex-A53)	MIPS 1004Kec	(Cortex-A53) @1.35GHz
SoC			--		IPQ5018			MT7621A		MT7622AV
RAM			--		512MB			256MB		512MB
MIMO	2.4GHz (2x2 MU-MIMO/OFDMA)	2.4GHz 2x2 (UL MU-MIMO) 2x2		4x4
	5/6GHz (4x4 MU-MIMO/OFDMA) 	5GHz 4x4 (DL/UL MU-MIMO) 2x2		4x4
Channel Width		20/40/80/160	20/40/80/160		20/40/80	20/40/80/160
Wi-Fi 4 Data Rate	574Mbps		574Mbps			300Mbps		600Mbps
Wi-Fi 5 Data Rate	1.7Gbps		1.7Gbps			867Mbps		1.7Gbps
Wi-Fi 6/6E Data Rate	4.8Gbps  	4.8Gbps			1.2Gbps		2.4Gbps
Ethernet		2.5GbE (RJ45)	Gigabit			Gigabit		Gigabit
''' [[Category:English Documentation]]
